sentence: Can you direct me to the nearest bookstore, please?
请问你能告诉我最近的书店怎么走吗？
My dream is to become a pilot and fly a big airplane.
我的梦想是成为一名飞行员，驾驶大飞机。
If you work hard, you will succeed in the final exam.
如果你努力学习，你会在期末考试中取得成功。
Our flight to Beijing will take off at three o'clock this afternoon.
我们飞往北京的航班将在今天下午三点起飞。
The football match was cancelled because of the heavy rain.
足球赛因为大雨被取消了。
What exactly do you want to do this weekend?
你这个周末到底想做什么？
Please take care of your little sister when mom is out.
妈妈不在家的时候请照顾好你的妹妹。
Excuse me, sir, you dropped your wallet on the floor.
先生，打扰一下，您的钱包掉在地上了。
The police officer helped us find the way to the museum.
那位警察帮助我们找到了去博物馆的路。
It is stupid to go out without a coat on such a cold day.
这么冷的天不穿外套就出去是很愚蠢的。
Please fasten your seat belt before the plane takes off.
请在飞机起飞前系好安全带。
He put on his jacket and went out to play with his friends.
他穿上夹克，然后出去和朋友玩了。
This blue bike is ours, and that red one belongs to Tom.
这辆蓝色的自行车是我们的，那辆红色的是汤姆的。
My father wears a tie to work every day.
我爸爸每天系着领带去上班。
We sit in the front row during the school assembly.
在学校集会时我们坐在前排。
Children are not allowed to swim in the pool without adults.
没有大人陪同，孩子们不允许在游泳池里游泳。
I hope I can pass all my subjects this term.
我希望这学期我能通过所有科目。
Playing games is secondary; studying is your main job now.
玩游戏是次要的；学习是你现在的主要任务。
My brother will go to secondary school next September.
我哥哥明年九月将要去上中学。
She was absent from school yesterday because she had a fever.
她昨天因为发烧没来上学。
The bell rings at eight o'clock, and our class begins.
铃声在八点响起，我们的课就开始了。
The wealthy man donated a lot of money to build a new library.
那个富人捐了很多钱来建一座新图书馆。
Many children fear the dark and like to sleep with a light on.
许多孩子害怕黑暗，喜欢开着灯睡觉。
I used to play basketball after school, but now I prefer swimming.
我过去常常放学后打篮球，但现在我更喜欢游泳。
Health is more important than wealth for most people.
对大多数人来说，健康比财富更重要。
This math problem is double the difficulty of the last one.
这道数学题的难度是上一道的两倍。
In the phrase 'a red apple', 'red' is an adjective.
在词组‘一个红苹果’中，‘红’是一个形容词。
He is very busy and seldom has time to watch TV.
他非常忙，很少有时间看电视。
I always carry a spare pen in my school bag.
我总是在书包里带一支备用钢笔。
I often read books in my spare time at the weekend.
我经常在周末的业余时间看书。
Please speak up; I can't hear you clearly at the back.
请大声点说；我在后面听不清你讲话。
The kind teacher uses sign language to teach the deaf students.
那位善良的老师用手语来教失聪的学生。
There is a tiny insect on the leaf of this flower.
这朵花的叶子上有一只很小的昆虫。
My father bought a new electric fan for the living room.
我爸爸为客厅买了一个新的电风扇。
Please turn off the light when you leave the classroom.
离开教室时请关灯。
We lit a candle when the electricity suddenly went out.
当电突然停了的时候，我们点了一支蜡烛。
The postman delivers letters and packages to our house every day.
邮递员每天把信件和包裹送到我们家。
It's very cold outside, so remember to wear your warm coat.
外面很冷，所以记得穿上你的保暖外套。
The heat from the sun makes us feel warm in summer.
夏天，太阳的热量让我们感到温暖。
Her mother has a full-time job at a local hospital.
她妈妈在当地医院有一份全职工作。
I saved my pocket money to afford this new dictionary.
我省下零花钱才买得起这本新词典。
He played the role of a brave knight in the school play.
他在学校话剧里扮演了一个勇敢的骑士。
A good education is very important for our future.
良好的教育对我们的未来非常重要。
Many students use bicycles as their main transport to school.
许多学生把自行车作为他们上学的主要交通工具。
We will set off for the park at seven tomorrow morning.
我们明天早上七点出发去公园。
I need to find a pair of clean socks for P.E. class.
我需要找一双干净的袜子上体育课。
You can call me whenever you need help with your homework.
无论何时你需要作业帮助，你都可以打电话给我。
Wearing proper clothes is necessary for the school trip.
为这次学校旅行，穿合适的衣服是必要的。
Be careful not to stand too close to the edge of the pool.
小心不要站得离游泳池边太近。
You should learn to finish your homework by yourself.
你应该学会自己完成作业。
The alarm clock will go off at six thirty tomorrow morning.
闹钟会在明天早上六点半响起。
I'm starving; let's have lunch as soon as possible.
我快饿死了；我们尽快吃午饭吧。
We usually go to the library to study on Saturday afternoons.
我们通常在星期六下午去图书馆学习。
He finished reading the short story in one go.
他一口气读完了那个短篇故事。
Children should not throw rocks at animals or people.
孩子们不应该向动物或人扔石头。
Rock climbing is an exciting but dangerous outdoor activity.
攀岩是一项刺激但危险的户外活动。
There is a small stone bridge over the river near our village.
我们村附近的河上有一座小石桥。
She is fairly good at drawing pictures of animals.
她画动物画得相当好。
The surface of the new desk is very smooth and clean.
这张新桌子的表面非常光滑干净。
Go straight along this road, and you will see the post office.
沿着这条路直走，你就会看到邮局。
We slept in a tent during our camping trip last summer.
去年夏天露营时，我们睡在帐篷里。
Leaves turn yellow and fall from the trees in autumn.
秋天，树叶变黄并从树上落下。
He was so tired that he fell asleep during the movie.
他太累了，以至于在看电影时睡着了。
Please hang your coat on the hook behind the door.
请把你的外套挂在门后的钩子上。
A sudden noise from outside made the little girl very scared.
外面突然的响声让小女孩非常害怕。
Police officers sometimes carry a gun to protect people.
警察有时会携带枪支来保护人们。
The new pillow is very soft and comfortable to sleep on.
新枕头非常柔软，睡在上面很舒服。
Please sit still while the teacher is talking.
老师讲话时请安静地坐着别动。
This old table is made of strong and beautiful wood.
这张旧桌子是用坚固而美丽的木头制成的。
The nurse took a little blood from his finger for the test.
护士从他的手指上取了一点血做化验。
I need to study hard to catch up with my classmates in math.
我需要努力学习，在数学上赶上我的同学们。
After long discussion, they finally reached an agreement.
经过长时间的讨论，他们终于达成了一致。
The blind man walks across the street with the help of his dog.
那位盲人在他的狗的帮助下过马路。
Ouch! I hit my knee on the corner of the desk.
哎哟！我的膝盖撞到桌角了。
They had to call off the picnic because of the bad weather.
因为天气不好，他们不得不取消了野餐。
Thanks to your help, I finished my project on time.
多亏了你的帮助，我按时完成了我的项目。
Good health care is important for everyone, especially the old.
良好的医疗保健对每个人都很重要，尤其是老人。
I expect to receive a birthday gift from my parents this year.
我期待今年能收到父母的一份生日礼物。
This job requires you to work for eight hours a day.
这份工作要求你每天工作八小时。
Physical exercise is good for both our body and mind.
体育锻炼对我们的身体和头脑都有好处。
With great effort, he finally solved the difficult problem.
通过巨大的努力，他终于解决了那个难题。
Once in a while, our family goes to the cinema on weekends.
偶尔，我们家会在周末去电影院。
Smoking will harm your health, so please don't try it.
吸烟会损害你的健康，所以请不要尝试。
I received an invitation to Lucy's birthday party yesterday.
昨天我收到了露西生日派对的邀请。
My best friend invited me to her house for dinner last Sunday.
上周日，我最好的朋友邀请我去她家吃晚饭。
There is a beautiful picture on the wall calendar in my room.
我房间的挂历上有一幅漂亮的图片。
The children were playing with colourful balloons at the party.
孩子们在派对上玩着五颜六色的气球。
We will paint the fence white during the art class tomorrow.
明天美术课上我们要把栅栏漆成白色。
You can heat up the soup in the microwave for two minutes.
你可以用微波炉把汤加热两分钟。
Please be careful when you use a knife to cut the bread.
当你用刀切面包时请小心。
In Western countries, people usually eat with a knife and fork.
在西方国家，人们通常用刀叉吃饭。
She uses a spoon to eat soup and a fork to eat salad.
她用勺子喝汤，用叉子吃沙拉。
I often order a cheeseburger and a cup of milk for lunch.
我午餐经常点一个芝士汉堡和一杯牛奶。
My father likes Italian food, especially pizza and pasta.
我爸爸喜欢意大利食物，尤其是披萨和意大利面。
Many Westerners celebrate Christmas with their families.
许多西方人和家人一起庆祝圣诞节。
The sun sets in the West at the end of the day.
太阳在一天结束时从西边落下。
The waiter will serve drinks and food to the customers.
服务员将为顾客端上饮料和食物。
Your new bicycle is similar to mine, but mine is blue.
你的新自行车和我的相似，但我的那辆是蓝色的。
The bird broke its wing and couldn't fly back to its nest.
那只鸟的翅膀受伤了，无法飞回它的巢。
The kind lady helped the lost boy find his parents.
那位善良的女士帮助迷路的小男孩找到了他的父母。
He is a true gentleman who always holds the door for others.
他是一位真正的绅士，总是为别人扶着门。
Please help yourself to some fruit on the table.
请随便吃点桌子上的水果。
Remember to look both ways before you cross the street.
过马路前记得要左右看看。
With enough practice, you can achieve your goal of swimming well.
通过足够的练习，你可以达到游好泳的目标。
All students, including those who are sick, must finish the homework.
所有学生，包括生病的那些，都必须完成作业。
The guest speaker told us interesting stories about his travels.
特邀演讲者给我们讲了他旅行的有趣故事。
Her boss is very strict but also fair to all the workers.
她的老板非常严格，但对所有工人也很公平。
The school secretary answers phone calls and helps visitors.
学校秘书接听电话并帮助来访者。
It's a quarter past seven; we have fifteen minutes before class.
现在是七点一刻；我们离上课还有十五分钟。
This city is famous for its car industry and technology.
这座城市以其汽车工业和技术而闻名。
The temperature dropped to zero degrees last night.
昨晚气温降到了零度。
My neighbour is Indian, and she sometimes cooks delicious curry.
我的邻居是印度人，她有时会做美味的咖喱。
What type of music do you like to listen to, pop or rock?
你喜欢听什么类型的音乐，流行乐还是摇滚乐？
She put her keys and phone into her small handbag.
她把钥匙和手机放进了她的小手提包里。
Our school basketball team beat their team in the final game.
我们学校的篮球队在决赛中打败了他们队。
Pardon? Could you please repeat the question more slowly?
抱歉？你能请慢点重复一遍那个问题吗？
I intend to visit my grandparents during the summer holiday.
我打算暑假期间去看望我的祖父母。
Could you please fetch me a glass of water from the kitchen?
你能请从厨房给我拿一杯水来吗？
My mother makes delicious pancakes for us on Sunday mornings.
我妈妈在星期天早上为我们做好吃的薄煎饼。
He gave his mother a beautiful red rose on her birthday.
他在母亲生日时送了她一朵美丽的红玫瑰。
It's not polite to laugh at others when they make mistakes.
当别人犯错时嘲笑他们是不礼貌的。
We should always show kindness to animals and people in need.
我们应该永远对动物和有需要的人表现出善意。
Don't give up easily when you face difficulties in learning.
当你在学习中遇到困难时不要轻易放弃。
This chocolate is very good; would you like to try one?
这种巧克力很好吃；你想尝一个吗？
She was very disappointed because she failed the history test.
她非常失望，因为她历史考试没及格。
There is a lamp and a clock on my bedside table.
我的床头柜上有一盏灯和一个闹钟。
I left a note on the fridge to remind my brother about the meeting.
我在冰箱上留了张便条提醒我弟弟开会的事。
Whom did you invite to your birthday party last weekend?
上周末你邀请了谁参加你的生日派对？
You should try your best to finish the task on time.
你应该尽力按时完成任务。
